content.text: Match ends, Mansfield Town 1, Cardiff City 4.
Second Half ends, Mansfield Town 1, Cardiff City 4.
Substitution, Cardiff City. Rhys Healey replaces David Junior Hoilett.
Attempt missed. Loïc Damour (Cardiff City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
